appraisers.name: Manhattan Fine Art Appraisers
appraisers.about: Manhattan Fine Art Appraisers brings decades of expertise to art valuation in New York City. Our team of certified appraisers specializes in both traditional and contemporary art forms.

services.name: Fine Art Appraisal
services.description: Complete valuation service for paintings, sculptures, and other fine art pieces.

services.name: Estate Appraisal
services.description: Comprehensive art collection valuation for estate planning or tax purposes.

services.name: Insurance Appraisal
services.description: Detailed documentation and valuation for insurance coverage.

reviews.author: Michael R.
reviews.content: Incredible attention to detail and vast knowledge of the art market. Their appraisal helped me secure proper insurance for my collection.

reviews.author: Emily W.
reviews.content: Very professional service. They provided extensive documentation and market analysis for my estate planning needs.
